solution_line_template: First find the total time Missy spends watching reality shows: {num_reality_shows} shows * {duration_reality_show} minutes/show = <<{num_reality_shows}*{duration_reality_show}={total_reality_show_time}>>{total_reality_show_time} minutes

Then add that amount to the time she spends watching the cartoon: {total_reality_show_time} minutes + {duration_cartoon} minutes = <<{total_reality_show_time}+{duration_cartoon}={total_tv_time}>>{total_tv_time} minutes
